concept.title: Installing the Hibernate Cache Module
concept.shortdesc: The Hibernate module is included in the installation package.

li.p: If you have not done so, download and install Hibernate. See for currently supported versions of Hibernate.

The Hibernate module is included in the installation package. You can find the module in the following location: <product_dir>/tools/Modules/Pivotal_GemFire_Modules-8.2-Hibernate.zipwhere <product_dir> is the location where you installed .

ol.li: Make sure that <product_dir>/lib/gemfire.jar is part of the CLASSPATH when you run Hibernate. Alternatively, you can place the gemfire.jar in a location that is accessible to your Hibernate application.
